metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26253 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Gluster GlusterFS 11.0, there is an xlators/mount/fuse/src/fuse-bridge.c notify stack-based buffer over-read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-26253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-cli - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
glusterfs-client - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
glusterfs-common - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
glusterfs-server - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
libgfapi0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
libgfchangelog0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
libgfrpc0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
libgfxdr0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
libglusterd0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
libglusterfs0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> stack-based overread is just a DoS on Ubuntu because of stack protector

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.1-1ubuntu0.1').
